titles.title: SERVE Act of 2008
Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2008
Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2008

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a $1,000 refundable credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of volunteer firefighting and emergency medical service organizations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Supporting Emergency Responders Volunteer Efforts Act of 2008 or the SERVE Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $1,000 refundable tax credit for individuals who are bona fide volunteer members of a qualified volunteer fire department who provide firefighting, ambulance, or emergency medical services.
